methods: abstract boolean canRead() Indicates whether the current context is allowed to read from this file.

abstract boolean isFile() Indicates if this file represents a file.
abstract long lastModified() Returns the time when this file was last modified, measured in milliseconds since January 1st, 1970, midnight.
